column2: Chesapeake Utilities Corp. engages in the distribution and transmission of natural gas, propane and electricity; and generation of electricity and steam. The company is headquartered in Dover, Delaware and currently employs 983 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Regulated Energy and Unregulated Energy. The firm provides natural gas transmission; electric distribution and generation; propane distribution; propane and crude oil wholesale marketing; steam generation, and other energy-related services. The Regulated Energy segment includes the Company's natural gas transmission and electric distribution operations. The Unregulated Energy segment includes its propane distribution, propane and crude oil wholesale marketing, gathering and processing, electricity and steam generation and other unregulated energy-related services to customers.
